mapper.select: SELECT AM_CODE ,AR_REASON ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDT_DE FROM tb_approval_reject WHERE AM_CODE = #{am_code} ORDER BY AR_SEQ DESC

SELECT A.AM_CODE ,C.OM_CODE ,C.OM_NM ,A.EM_NO ,D.EM_NM ,A.AM_APPROVER_EM_NO ,H.EM_NM AS AM_APPROVER_EM_NM ,A.AM_STATUS ,E.C_NAME AS AM_STATUS_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(A.AM_APPROVAL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS AM_APPROVAL_DATE ,A.DELETE_AT ,D.EM_DTY_CODE ,F.C_NAME AS EM_DTY_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDT_DE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS UPDT_DE ,B.AD_TYPE ,G.C_NAME AS AD_TYPE_NM ,B.AD_REASON ,DATE_FORMAT(B.AD_DATE_FROM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS AD_DATE_FROM ,B.AD_DATE_FROM_HHMM ,DATE_FORMAT(B.AD_DATE_TO, '%Y-%m-%d') AS AD_DATE_TO ,B.AD_DATE_TO_HHMM ,B.AM_NO ,CASE WHEN A.AM_STATUS = '0000000065' THEN ( SELECT U.AR_REASON FROM tb_approval_reject U WHERE U.AR_SEQ = ( SELECT MAX(T.AR_SEQ) FROM tb_approval_reject T WHERE T.AM_CODE = A.AM_CODE ) ) WHEN A.AM_STATUS = '0000000391' THEN ( SELECT U.AR_REASON FROM tb_approval_reject U WHERE U.AR_SEQ = ( SELECT MAX(T.AR_SEQ) FROM tb_approval_reject T WHERE T.AM_CODE = A.AM_CODE ) ) ELSE '' END AS AR_REASON ,CASE WHEN A.AM_STATUS = '0000000065' THEN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(U.UPDT_DE, '%Y-%m-%d') FROM tb_approval_reject U WHERE U.AR_SEQ = ( SELECT MAX(T.AR_SEQ) FROM tb_approval_reject T WHERE T.AM_CODE = A.AM_CODE ) ) WHEN A.AM_STATUS = '0000000391' THEN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(U.UPDT_DE, '%Y-%m-%d') FROM tb_approval_reject U WHERE U.AR_SEQ = ( SELECT MAX(T.AR_SEQ) FROM tb_approval_reject T WHERE T.AM_CODE = A.AM_CODE ) ) ELSE '' END AS REJECT_DATE ,(CASE WHEN D.EM_DTY_CODE = '0000000006' THEN (SELECT SM.SM_NM FROM TB_STR_MANAGE SM, TB_STR_EMPL SE WHERE SM.SM_CODE = SE.SM_CODE AND SE.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND SE.EM_NO = D.EM_NO LIMIT 1 ) WHEN D.EM_DTY_CODE = '0000000391' THEN (SELECT SM.SM_NM FROM TB_STR_MANAGE SM, TB_STR_EMPL SE WHERE SM.SM_CODE = SE.SM_CODE AND SE.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND SE.EM_NO = D.EM_NO LIMIT 1 ) ELSE '' END ) AS STR_NM FROM tb_approval_mst A, tb_approval_dtl B, tb_orgnzt_manage C, tb_empl_manage D, tb_empl_manage H, tb_code E, tb_code F, tb_code G WHERE A.AM_CODE = B.AM_CODE AND A.OM_CODE = C.OM_CODE AND A.EM_NO = D.EM_NO AND A.AM_APPROVER_EM_NO = H.EM_NO AND A.AM_STATUS = E.C_CODE AND D.EM_DTY_CODE = F.C_CODE AND B.AD_TYPE = G.C_CODE AND A.DELETE_AT='N' AND A.AM_CODE = #{am_code}

SELECT B.EM_NM AS AM_APPROVER_EM_NM, A.AM_APPROVER_EM_NO, C.EM_NM, A.EM_NO, B.EM_PUSH_ID, B.EM_DEVICE_TYPE FROM TB_APPROVAL_MST A, TB_EMPL_MANAGE B, TB_EMPL_MANAGE C WHERE A.AM_APPROVER_EM_NO = B.EM_NO AND A.EM_NO = C.EM_NO AND B.EM_DEVICE_TYPE IS NOT NULL AND B.EM_PUSH_ID IS NOT NULL AND AM_CODE = IF( #{am_code} IS NULL OR #{am_code} ='', #{res_am_code}, #{am_code}) limit 1

SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) FROM TB_APPROVAL_MST A, TB_APPROVAL_DTL B WHERE A.am_code = B.am_code AND A.em_no = #{em_no} AND (AD_DATE_FROM BETWEEN #{ad_date_from} AND #{ad_date_to} OR AD_DATE_TO BETWEEN #{ad_date_from} AND #{ad_date_to}) AND A.am_status ='0000000064' AND A.delete_at != 'Y'
